data.name: BlueprintLoggingHeaders
EnumToString
HelperHeaders
LOG_NETMODE_WORLD
data.value: #ifndef LOG_NETMODE_WORLD #define LOG_NETMODE_WORLD (((GEngine == nullptr) || (GetWorld() == nullptr)) ? TEXT("[Initialisation] ") \ : (GEngine->GetNetMode(GetWorld()) == NM_Client) ? TEXT("[Client] ") \ : (GEngine->GetNetMode(GetWorld()) == NM_ListenServer) ? TEXT("[Server] ") \ : (GEngine->GetNetMode(GetWorld()) == NM_DedicatedServer) ? TEXT("[Server] ") \ : (GEngine->GetNetMode(GetWorld()) == NM_Standalone) ? TEXT("[Standalone] ") \ : TEXT("[Log] ")) #endif // !LOG_NETMODE_WORLD

data.name: LOG_NETMODE_WORLD_STATIC
data.value: #ifndef LOG_NETMODE_WORLD_STATIC #define LOG_NETMODE_WORLD_STATIC (((GEngine == nullptr) || (WorldContextObject->GetWorld() == nullptr)) ? TEXT("[Initialisation] ") \ : (GEngine->GetNetMode(WorldContextObject->GetWorld()) == NM_Client) ? TEXT("[Client] ") \ : (GEngine->GetNetMode(WorldContextObject->GetWorld()) == NM_ListenServer) ? TEXT("[Server] ") \ : (GEngine->GetNetMode(WorldContextObject->GetWorld()) == NM_DedicatedServer) ? TEXT("[Server] ") \ : (GEngine->GetNetMode(WorldContextObject->GetWorld()) == NM_Standalone) ? TEXT("[Standalone] ") \ : TEXT("[Log] ")) #endif // !LOG_NETMODE_WORLD_STATIC
